## Question 3

### a)

```{r}
flag = 0
```


```{r error=TRUE}
while (!flag){
  k = 1
  h = matrix(ncol = k,nrow = k)
  for (i in 1:k){
    for (j in 1:k){
      h[i,j] = (i+j-1)^(-1)
    }
  }
  
  e_1 = rep(0,k)
  e_1[1] = 1
  
  tryCatch({
    # code that might produce an error
    result <- solve(h,e_1)
  }, error = function(e) {
    # code to handle the error
    stop("This chunk has an error!")
    print(result)
    flag = 1
  })
  
  if (flag) {break}
  k = k+1
}
```
